articles.title: Vanessa Whyte and James and Sara Rutledge named as victims
articles.description: Police say a triple murder and attempted suicide is one line of inquiry and appeal to anyone who spoke to the victims recently.
articles.content:
Mum and children killed in shooting 'valued and much loved'
6 minutes ago Share Save Hayley Halpin BBC News NI Share Save
PSNI The three victims have been named as Vanessa Whyte and her son James and daughter Sara
A mother and two children killed in ... [3691 chars]
